description: This file defines a Button component for a LightningJS application. It is a focusable rectangle with a text label, configurable through properties, and handles press actions.

classes.name: Component
classes.description: A LightningJS component class extended to create a Button with label, styling, and event handling.

methods.name: state
methods.description: Initializes the component state with default properties for label, size, color, and callback.

methods.name: onInit
methods.description: Initializes the component state based on props passed during instantiation.

methods.name: onEnter
methods.description: Handles the enter event, executing the callback if provided.

methods.name: onClick
methods.description: Handles click events, executing the callback if provided.
